sentences.text: FROM OUR CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholders,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the entire Board, I  would like to thank all of our shareholders for your continued support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year marks a continuation of the strategic transformation that has been underway for several years, as we evolve from  an acquisition and exploitation approach to one that relies on organic growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the Board continued to  proactively implement measures initiated several years ago to navigate a challenging commodity price environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We  completed a strategic portfolio review and sold non-core assets, reduced costs across the company, aligned activity levels  to prices, and maintained stable production volumes in high-margin areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As our CEO John Christmann likes to say, we  lived within our cash flow and played great defense.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In our shift toward strong organic growth, we also played smart offense, positioning Apache for the long-term:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Redirected capital to onshore North American growth assets
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Allocated a high percentage of 2016 capital to strategic testing
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expanded and de-risked our inventory
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Centralized and integrated the capital allocation process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Leveraged creative innovations from our technical teams
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apache's approach is exemplified by our discovery of a new world-class resource play, Alpine High, in the Delaware Basin of Texas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In September, after multiple years of geologic  and geophysical work, acreage accumulation, testing and drilling, we confirmed the discovery of a vast inventory of repeatable, high-value drilling locations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With Alpine High  contributing thousands of future drilling locations to our portfolio, Apache is positioned for profitable North American growth for the foreseeable future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year, our directors and management team also continued our expansive shareholder outreach efforts in order to ensure the Board maintains clear and open lines of  communication with our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the course of the year, Apache held 61 in-person meetings across six different time zones, in an effort to gain our investors' insights on  Apache's long-term strategy, corporate governance, and executive compensation program In 2016, we also conducted broad outreach specifically focused on sustainability risk  management and disclosure, which included a productive session between some of our ESG-focused shareholders and our CEO on the work Apache is doing on environmental and  social issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are grateful for the opportunity to continue these dialogues in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At Apache, we strive to be the premier exploration and production company with global assets focused on North American growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is proud of the progress we have made  on this transformation to date, and we are committed with unrelenting focus to realizing its full potential.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your continued investment  it is a privilege for our Board to serve on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to a robust shareholder engagement program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board values our shareholders' perspectives, and feedback from shareholders on our business, corporate  governance, executive compensation, and sustainability practices are important considerations for Board discussions throughout the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To that end, Apache's Board and  management attended 61 in-person shareholder meetings in 2016, including in-person meetings with 15 of our top 25 shareholders representing 54 percent of Apache's shares outstanding in aggregate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our year-round focus on shareholder outreach is described in more detail below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MAY TO JULY Review and summarize feedback  from annual meeting and identify  potential areas of concern.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FEBRUARY TO APRIL Complete shareholder meetings, meet internally to  review feedback received, and consider modification  of governance policies and compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AUGUST TO OCTOBER Meet with shareholders and  consider issues raised.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOVEMBER TO JANUARY Continue to meet with shareholders, modify  meeting content based on early feedback,  and identify any other areas of concern.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) conduct multiple meetings each year with shareholder groups to discuss governance issues,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) conduct an annual in-person meeting between our CEO and  shareholders on environmental and social issues,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) participate with our shareholders in various governance forums, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) as appropriate, facilitate meetings between  shareholders and our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our meetings and interactions with shareholders are designed to better understand how our shareholders perceive Apache and to provide our  shareholders an opportunity to discuss matters that they think deserve attention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our engagement has been productive and provides for an open exchange of ideas and  perspectives with our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We froze NEO salaries in 2016 as part of Apaches continued effort to reduce capital, overhead, and operating costs to live within our means

sentences.text: We discontinued the use of management objectives from the 2016 annual bonus calculation, based on shareholder feedback and an effort to  remove complexities of the annual incentive plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee accepted managements recommendation of a 172 percent annual cash incentive bonus pool, which was between the 142 percent to 182 percent range  actually achieved, due to outstanding achievement of the Companys goals for 2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance share program for 2016 continued to incorporate total shareholder return and two other important financial measures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the CEO and Executive Vice President levels, the 2016 long-term compensation awards were based 50 percent in performance shares, 35 percent in restricted stock units, and 15 percent in options;

sentences.text: We provided 70 percent of CEOs 2016 compensation in equity-based awards.

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement contains information about the 2017 annual meeting of shareholders of Apache Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this proxy statement both Apache and the Company refer to  Apache Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement and the enclosed proxy card are being made available to you by the Companys Board of Directors starting on or about March 28, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PURPOSE OF THE ANNUAL MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Companys annual meeting, shareholders will vote on the following matters:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 1-7: election of directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 8: ratification of appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as the Companys independent auditors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 9: advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Companys named executive officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 10: advisory vote on frequency of advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Companys named executive officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transaction of any other business that properly comes before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the date of this proxy statement, the Company is not aware of any other business to come before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no rights of appraisal or similar rights of dissenters arising from matters to be acted on at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHO CAN VOTE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only shareholders of record holding shares of Apache common stock at the close of business on the record date, March 13, 2017, are entitled to receive notice of the annual meeting  and to vote the shares of Apache common stock they held on that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys stock transfer books will not be closed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A complete list of shareholders entitled to vote at the  annual meeting will be available for examination by any Apache shareholder at 2000 Post Oak Boulevard, Suite 100, Houston, Texas 77056-4400, for purposes relating to the annual  meeting, during normal business hours for a period often days before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 28, 2017, there were 380,370,129 shares of Apache common stock issued and outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of Apache common stock are entitled to one vote per share and  are not allowed to cumulate votes in the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HOW TO VOTE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares of Apache common stock are held by a broker, bank, or other nominee (in street name), you will receive instructions from them on how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your  shares are held by a broker and you do not give the broker specific instructions on how to vote your shares, your broker may vote your shares at its discretion on routine matters to  be acted upon at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, your shares will not be voted on any of the non-routine matters described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An absence of voting instructions on any  non-routine matters will result in a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The only routine matter to be acted upon at the annual meeting is Proposal No. 8: ratification of appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as the Companys independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other  matters to be acted upon at the annual meeting are non-routine matters and, as such, if you hold all or any portion of your shares in street name and you do not give your broker or  bank specific instructions on how to vote your shares, your shares will not be voted on any of the following non-routine matters:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 1-7: election of directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 9: advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Companys named executive officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold shares of Apache common stock in your own name (as a shareholder of record), you may instruct the Company on how to vote your shares:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1)  over the Internet by following the instructions provided in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: )  if you requested to receive printed proxy materials, by scanning the QR code on the enclosed proxy card with your mobile device (specific directions for using the mobile voting system are shown on the proxy card); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3)  if you requested to receive printed proxy materials, by using the toll-free telephone number listed on the enclosed proxy card (specific directions for using the telephone voting system are included on the proxy card); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4)  if you requested to receive printed proxy materials, by marking, signing, dating, and returning the enclosed proxy card in the postage-paid envelop
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When using internet, mobile device, or telephone voting, the voting systems will verify that you are a shareholder through the use of a company number for Apache and a unique control number for you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whichever method you use to transmit your instructions, your shares of Apache common stock will be voted as you direct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you designate the proxies named on the proxy card to vote on your behalf, but do not specify how to vote your shares, they will be voted:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of the nominees for director,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as the Companys independent auditors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Companys named executive officers,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the advisory vote on the compensation of the Companys named executive officers to be held on an annual basis, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the judgment of the persons voting the proxy on any other matter properly brought before the meeting, if any are properly raised at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote in advance using one of these methods, you may still attend and vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING 401 (K) SAVINGS PLAN SHARES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are an employee or former employee participating in the Apache 401 (k) Savings Plan and have shares of Apache common stock credited to your plan account as of the record  date, you will receive printed proxy materials including a proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have the right to direct the plan trustee regarding how to vote the shares credited to your plan account as of  the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The trustee for the 401 (k) Savings Plan is Fidelity Management Trust Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The trustee will vote the shares in your plan account in accordance with your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not send instructions (in the manner described under How to Vote above) or if your proxy card is not received by May 8, 2017, the shares credited to your account will be voted by the trustee in the same proportion as it votes shares for which it did receive timely instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: REVOKING A PROXY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke a proxy before it is voted by submitting a new proxy with a later date by internet, mobile device, telephone, or mail (if applicable), by voting at the meeting, or by filing  a written revocation with Apaches corporate secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your attendance at the annual meeting alone will not automatically revoke your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUORUM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence at the annual meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the shares of Apache common stock outstanding on the record date will constitute a  quorum, permitting the business of the meeting to be conducted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast at the annual meeting is required for the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote FOR or AGAINST any or all director nominees or you  may ABSTAIN as to one or more director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in our bylaws, only votes FOR or AGAINST the election of a director nominee will be counted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and  broker non-votes count for quorum purposes, but not for purposes of the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A vote to ABSTAIN is not treated as a vote FOR or AGAINST and will have no effect on  the outcome of the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of the Appointment of Independent Auditors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast at the annual meeting is required for ratification of appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as the Companys independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You  may vote FOR or AGAINST the ratification of appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as the Companys independent auditors or you may ABSTAIN.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes cast FOR or AGAINST and  ABSTENTIONS with respect to this matter will be counted as shares entitled to vote on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will also be counted as shares entitled to vote on this matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A  vote to ABSTAIN will have the effect of a vote AGAINST ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote to Approve the Compensation of Our Named Executive Officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote FOR or AGAINST the advisory vote to approve the compensation of our named executive officers or you may ABSTAIN.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the shares of common stock  present in person or represented by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote must be voted FOR approval of the advisory proposal in order for it to pass.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes cast FOR or  AGAINST and ABSTENTIONS with respect to the proposal will be counted as shares entitled to vote on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will not be counted as shares entitled to vote  on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A vote to ABSTAIN will have the effect of a vote AGAINST the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote on Frequency of Advisory Vote to Approve the Compensation of Our Named Executive Officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A plurality of the shares of common stock present in person or represented by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote must be voted FOR approval of holding the advisory  vote on the compensation of our named executive officers either every one, two, or three years in order for the proposal to pass.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote to hold the advisory vote on  compensation of named executive officers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every year (recommended by our Board of Directors);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every two years;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every three years; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may ABSTAIN from voting on this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will not be counted as shares entitled to vote on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A vote to ABSTAIN will have the effect of a vote AGAINST the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Business
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast at the annual meeting is required for approval of any other business that may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment  thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only votes FOR or AGAINST approval of any other business will be counted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes count for quorum purposes, but not for the voting on the  approval of such other business.

sentences.text: Effective May 14, 2015, the Companys Restated Certificate of Incorporation was amended to provide that, beginning at the 2016 annual meeting, directors standing for election will  be elected to one-year terms.

sentences.text: The existing terms of directors elected prior to or at the 2015 annual meeting were not shortened.

sentences.text: The entire Board of Directors will be elected annually  beginning at the 2018 annual meeting.

sentences.text: The current terms of directors Annell R. Bay, John J. Christmann IV, Chansoo Joung, William C. Montgomery, Amy H. Nelson, Daniel W. Rabun, and Peter A. Ragauss will expire at  the annual meeting.

sentences.text: Each of Ms. Bay, Mr. Christmann, Mr. Joung, Mr. Montgomery, Ms. Nelson, Mr. Rabun, and Mr. Ragauss has been recommended by the Companys Corporate  Governance and Nominating Committee and nominated by the Board of Directors for election by the shareholders to an additional one-year term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If elected, Ms. Bay, Mr. Christmann,  Mr. Joung, Mr. Montgomery, Ms. Nelson, Mr. Rabun, and Mr. Ragauss will serve beginning upon their election until the annual meeting of shareholders in 2018.

sentences.text: ANN ELL R. BAY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board tenure and responsibilities: Ms. Bay, 61, joined the Company's Board of Directors in May 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She chairs the Corporate Governance and Nominating Committee and is a member of the Management Development and Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Experience: From July 2011 to April 2014, Ms. Bay served as vice president, Global Exploration, of Marathon Oil Corporation, having previously held the position of  senior vice president, Exploration, since June 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From August 2004, prior to joining Marathon, Ms. Bay served as vice president, Americas Exploration, of Shell Exploration and Production Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Shell, Ms. Bay was vice president, Worldwide Exploration, and vice president, North America Exploration, of Kerr-McGee Oil and Gas Corporation, having been with  Oryx Energy prior to its merger with Kerr-McGee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Bay serves as a director of Hunting PLC, a London-based energy service provider, and Verisk Analytics, Inc., a global data analytics provider.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She also serves on the advisory  boards for the Jackson School of Geology at the University of Texas at Austin, the American Association of Petroleum Geology, and the Independent Petroleum Association of  America Education Center.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Skills and qualifications: With her extensive executive experience in the oil and gas industry, and as a result of her service on the advisory boards of educational and industry organizations, Ms. Bay brings to  the Board a wealth of oil and gas exploration and operations, and civic and educational experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a member of public company boards in two countries having significantly different governance regulatory regimes, Ms. Bay also brings unique governance skills and experience to  the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She is a highly regarded speaker at major governance events on both sides of the Atlantic.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She has hosted individual and small group meetings with large and  environmental-, social- and governance- (ESG) focused shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As chair of the CG&N Committee, she has overseen the updating of the company's governance principles and  the adoption of a committee calendar formalizing oversight of key ESG subjects.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CHANSOO JOUNG
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board tenure and responsibilities: Mr. Joung, 56, joined the Company's Board of Directors in February 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He chairsthe Audit Committee and is a member of the Corporate Governance  and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Experience: From 2005 to 2015, Mr. Joung was a partner and then senior advisor at Warburg Pincus LLC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was responsible for making and monitoring  investments in all sectors of the energy industry, including upstream, gas and gas liquids processing and transportation, and electric power.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was also  responsible for global coordination of the firm's renewables activities, including wind, solar, biofuels, and grid storage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1937 to 2004, Mr. Joung was employed by Goldman Sachs where he held increasingly senior positions, culminating his 17-year career as head of the Americas Natural  Resources Group in the investment banking division.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His other leadership responsibilities in the investment banking division included stints as co-head of recruiting and co-head of  women's and diversity recruitment and development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: rior to joining Apache's board, Mr. Joung served as a director on two other NYSE-listed company boards: Targa Resources Partners, LP, from 2007 to 2011, and Targa Resources orporation, from 2010 to 2011.

sentences.text: He also served as a director on a number of private company boards during his tenure at Warburg Pincus.

sentences.text: Currently, Mr. Joung is a consultant for TPH Asset Management, LLC, an affiliate of Tudor, Pickering, Holt &Co.

sentences.text: Skills and qualifications: Mr. Joung has spent almost his entire career in the finance industry working with energy companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through his experiences in private equity and as an investment banker,  Mr. Joung gained significant experience with energy companies, the energy industry, and energy-related capital markets and mergers and acquisitions activity, which enhance his  contributions to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Those experiences have also given Mr. Joung the ability to identify, assess, and manage risk that can affect a large energy company like Apache.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Experience: From October 2002 to April 2011, Mr. Montgomery was a partner in the investment banking division of Goldman, Sachs & Co., where he headed the  firm's Americas Natural Resources Group as well as its Houston office and was a member of the Investment Banking Services Leadership Group.

sentences.text: Over  the span of 22 years as an investment banker, Mr. Montgomery focused globally on large-cap energy companies, primarily in the upstream, integrated,  and oil service sectors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a  member of Quantum Energy's executive and investment committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In October 2015, Mr. Montgomery was elected a director of Enterprise Products Holdings LLC, the general  partner of Enterprise Products Partners L.P, and serves on its audit and conflicts committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Montgomery has been an active civic leader, chairing the boards of the Houston Museum of Natural Science and the St. Francis Episcopal Day School.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He currently serves on the  board of trustees of the Kinkaid School, the Episcopal Health Foundation, and the Board of Visitors of the MD Anderson Cancer Center.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Montgomery has spent almost his entire career working in the finance industry focusing on large-cap energy companies.

sentences.text: Formerly as an investment banker and nowin private  equity, Mr. Montgomery has gained significant experience with the energy industry and energy-related capital markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company also benefits from the extensive relationships  that Mr. Montgomery has formed throughout his career serving various global energy companies.

sentences.text: Mr. Montgomery's contributions to the Board are aided by the knowledge and  experience he gained from his current and former roles, which have involved broad and deep exposure to key issues impacting the upstream, midstream, and oil services sectors.

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016 and the first two months of 2017, the Board of Directors evaluated all business and charitable relationships between the Company and the Company's non-employee  directors (all directors other than Mr. Christmann) and all other relevant facts and circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of the evaluation, the Board of Directors determined, as required by the  Company's Governance Principles, that each non-employee director is an independent director as defined by the standards for director independence established by applicable laws,  rules, and listing standards including, without limitation, the standards for independent directors established by The New York Stock Exchange, Inc. (NYSE"), The NASDAQ National  Market (NASDAQ"), and the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC").
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company's Governance Principles are available on the Company's website (www.apachecorp.com).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company's Governance Principles require that the independent directors meet in executive session at least twice each year; in 2016, they met five times in executive session.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These executive sessions are chaired by a non-executive chairman or a lead director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Company's Governance Principles, the non-executive chairman or lead director  is an independent director who is elected from time to time, but not less than annually, by the affirmative vote of a majority of the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to chairing the  executive sessions, the non-executive chairman or lead director discusses management's proposed meeting agenda with the other independent directors and reviews the approved  meeting agenda with our chief executive officer, leads the discussion with our chief executive officer following the independent directors' executive sessions, ensures that the Board's  individual group and committee self-assessments are done annually, leads periodic discussions with other Board members and management concerning the Board's information  needs, and is available for discussions with major shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John E. Lowe has served as the Company's non-executive chairman since May 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role and responsibilities of  the non-executive chairman or lead director and the method established for communication of concerns to the independent directors are included in the Company's Governance Principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure and Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At different times in the Companys history the positions of chair and chief executive officer have been split or combined as circumstances have warranted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with good  governance practices, the Company took the opportunity presented by the retirement of our former chief executive officer and president, to create a position for an independent  non-executive chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent director John E. Lowe was appointed non-executive chairman effective May 2, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board regularly reviews all aspects of its governance  profile, including the Board leadership structure, and will make changes as appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The goal of the Companys risk management process is to understand and manage risk; management is responsible for identifying and managing the risks, while directors provide  oversight to management in this process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management identifies the significant risks facing the Company and the approaches to mitigate such risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys Governance  Principles state that in addition to its general oversight of management, the Board of Directors is responsible for a number of specific functions, including assessing major risks facing  the Company and reviewing options for their mitigation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has three standing independent committees: Audit, Corporate Governance and Nominating, and Management Development and Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit  Committee is primarily responsible for overseeing the Companys risk management processes on behalf of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee charter provides that the Audit Committee  should discuss and consider the process by which senior management of the Company and the relevant departments assess and manage the Companys exposure to risk, and  discuss the Companys major financial risk exposure and the steps management has taken to monitor, control, and report such exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee reports to  the Board of Directors, which also considers the Companys risk profile.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board of Directors obtain input from management regarding the most significant  risks facing the Company and the Companys risk management strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board endeavor to ensure that the risks undertaken are consistent with the Boards tolerance for risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Board is responsible for setting,  monitoring, and maintaining the Companys risk management policies and practices, the Companys executive officers and members of our management team are responsible for  implementing and overseeing our day-to-day risk management processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, the Board has created a Corporate Risk Committee composed of certain members of our  management team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Risk Committee monitors and manages risks and is tasked with, among other things, ensuring sound policies, procedures, and practices are in  place to address corporate-wide management of risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company believes that this division of responsibility is the most effective way to monitor and control risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the oversight provided by our full Board of Directors, Audit Committee, executive officers and the members of our management team, including our Corporate Risk  Committee, our independent directors hold regularly scheduled executive sessions as often as they deem appropriate, but in any event at least twice each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These executive  sessions provide an additional avenue through which we monitor the Companys risk exposure and policies regarding risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For risk considerations in our compensation programs, please see Compensation Discussion and Analysis -  Risk Considerations in Our Compensation Programs included in this  proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Standing Committees and Meetings of  the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has an Audit Committee, a Corporate Governance and Nominating ("CG&N") Committee, and a Management Development and Compensation ("MD&C")  Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Actions taken by these committees are reported to the Board of Directors at the next Board meeting.

sentences.text: Criteria for New Board Members and Re-Election of Board Members
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CG&N Committee considers the following criteria in recommending new nominees or the re-election of directors to the Companys Board of D
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expertise and perspective needed to govern the business and strengthen and support senior management; for example: strong financial expertise, knowledge of international operations, or knowledge of the petroleum industry and/or related industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sound business judgment and a sufficiently broad perspective to make meaningful contributions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Interest and enthusiasm in the Company and a commitment to become involved in its future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The time and energy to meet Board of Directors commitments
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ability to constructively participate in discussions, with the capacity to quickly understand and evaluate complex and diverse issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dedication to the highest ethical standards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dedication to the highest health, safety, and environmental standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supportive of management, but independent, objective, and willing to question and challenge both openly and in private exchanges
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An awareness of the dynamics of change and a willingness to anticipate and explore opportunities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The above criteria and guidelines, together with the section of the Companys Governance Principles entitled Qualifications of Board Members, constitute the policy of the CG&N  Committee regarding the recommendation of new nominees or the re-election of directors to the Companys Board of Directors or its committees.

sentences.text: Diversity
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company policy precludes directors and employees from discriminating against any protected group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company policy also precludes directors and employees from basing work-  related decisions on anything other than work-relevant criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys approach to diversity complements these policies without conflicting with them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that Board  diversity in all its aspects is essential to our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our criteria for Board selection, summarized above, operates as our diversity policy.

sentences.text: Report of the Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following report of the Audit Committee of the Company shall not be deemed to be soliciting material or to be filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, nor shall this report be incorporated by reference into any filing made by the Company under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is operated under a charter that specifies the scope of the Committees responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter, which is reviewed annually and available on the Companys  website (www.apachecorp.com), was last amended and restated effective July 15, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined that all five members of the Committee are independent based upon the standards adopted by the Board, which incorporate the independence requirements under applicable laws, rules, and regulations, including the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange and the NASDAQ National Market and Rule 10A-3 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys management has the primary responsibility for preparing the Companys financial statements, managing the accounting and financial reporting processes, devising  and maintaining the systems of internal controls over financial reporting, and assessing the effectiveness of internal controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLP, Apaches  independent registered public accounting firm (the independent auditors), is responsible for the integrated audit of the consolidated financial statements and auditing the Companys  internal controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees responsibility is to monitor and oversee these processes and procedures on behalf of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee held nine meetings during fiscal year 2016, including the five in-person meetings referenced below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meetings of the Audit Committee are designed to  facilitate and encourage communication among the Audit Committee, the Company, the Companys internal audit function, and the Companys independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meeting  agendas are set based upon the Audit Committee Charter and also include suggested topics from Committee members and/or other relevant topics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At four of the five Audit  Committee meetings held in person during 2016, the Committee met with the internal auditors and the independent auditors, with and without management present, to discuss the  results of their examinations, their evaluations of the Companys internal controls, including internal controls over financial reporting, and the overall quality of the Companys financial  reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee is responsible for oversight of the qualifications, performance, and independence of the Companys independent auditors and annually determines whether to retain  the Companys current independent auditors or retain another auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In doing so, the Audit Committee takes into consideration a number of factors, including the historical and  recent performance of the independent auditors and lead partner, its global capabilities, its knowledge of the Companys operations and industry, external data relating to audit quality  and performance, including recent Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States) (PCAOB) reports, and independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee recognizes the  importance of maintaining the independence of the Companys independent auditors, in both fact and appearance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed with the Companys internal auditors and the independent auditors the overall scope and plans for their respective audits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit  Committee reviewed with the independent auditors, which is responsible for expressing an opinion on the conformity of the Companys audited consolidated financial statements with  U.S. generally accepted accounting principles, its judgments as to the quality, not just the acceptability, of the Companys accounting principles and such other matters as are required  to be discussed with the Audit Committee by the standards of the PCAOB, including PCAOB Auditing Standard No. 1301, Communications With Audit Committees, the rules of the  Securities and Exchange Commission, and other applicable regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee has discussed with the independent auditors the firms independence from  Company management and the Company, including the matters in the letter from the firm required by PCAOB Rule 3526, Communication with Audit Committees Concerning Independence, and considered the compatibility of non-audit services with the independent auditors independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also reviewed and discussed together with management, the internal auditors, and the independent auditors the Companys audited consolidated financial  statements included in the Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, including the clarity of disclosures in the financial statements, the results  of managements assessment of the effectiveness of the Companys internal controls over financial reporting, and the independent auditors audit of the Companys internal controls  over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Summary of 2016 Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the terms of the Companys Non-Employee Directors Compensation Plan and the Non-Employee Directors Restricted Stock Units Program, each non-employee director  receives an annual retainer, paid one-third in cash and two-thirds in stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The equity component of the annual board retainer for the Companys non-employee directors is not paid out until the non-employee director retires or otherwise leaves the Board of  Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The retirement plan for the Companys non-employee directors limits participation to those members first elected to the Board of Directors on or before June 30, 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-Employee Directors Cash Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, under the terms of the Companys Non-Employee Directors Compensation Plan, each non-employee director received an annual cash retainer of $100,000 for service  on the Board of Directors, the non-executive chairman of the Board received an additional annual cash retainer of $100,000, and the chair of each committee received an additional  cash retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were no separate meeting attendance fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the terms of the Non-Employee Directors Compensation Plan, non-employee directors can defer receipt of all or any portion of their cash retainers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred cash amounts  accrue interest equal to the Companys rate of return on its short-term marketable securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once each year, participating directors may elect to transfer all or a portion of their  deferred cash amounts into the form of shares of Apache common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After such election, amounts deferred in the form of Apache common stock accrue dividends as if the stock  were issued and outstanding when such dividends were payable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All deferred amounts, as well as accrued interest and dividends, are maintained in a separate memorandum  account for each participating non-employee director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amounts are paid out in cash and/or shares of Apache common stock, as applicable, upon the non-employee directors  retirement or other termination of his or her directorship, or on a specific date, in a lump sum or in annual installments over a ten-year (or shorter) period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, one  non-employee director deferred all of his cash retainer fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-Employee Directors Restricted Stock Units Program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, pursuant to the Companys Non-Employee Directors Restricted Stock Units Program (the RSU Program), all non-employee directors were eligible to receive grants of  restricted stock units (RSUs) at the end of each calendar quarter, with the number of RSUs calculated by dividing $50,000 by the fair market value of a share of Apache common  stock on the date of grant, rounded down to the nearest whole number.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the RSU Program, the Companys non-executive chairman of the Board was also eligible to  receive additional grants of RSUs at the end of each calendar quarter, with the number of RSUs calculated by dividing $25,000 by the fair market value of a share of Apache common  stock on the date of grant, rounded down to the nearest whole number.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grants under the RSU Program were made pursuant to the Companys 2011 Omnibus Equity Compensation Plan for the first quarter 2016, and were made pursuant to the  Companys 2016 Omnibus Compensation Plan for the second, third, and fourth quarters 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each RSU is equivalent to one share of Apache common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If applicable, the grant is prorated for the non-employee directors or non-executive chairmans service during the  calendar quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The RSUs vest as of the grant date, with 100 percent automatic, mandatory deferral into the Outside Directors Deferral Program (the Deferral Program) established pursuant to the  Companys 2011 Omnibus Equity Compensation Plan and, beginning in the second quarter 2016, under the 2016 Omnibus Compensation Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferrals are invested in stock units  with each stock unit being equivalent to one share of Apache common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock units accrue dividends as if the stock was issued and outstanding when such dividends were  payable, and all dividend amounts are invested in additional stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stock units are maintained in a separate memorandum account for each non-employee director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock  units in the Deferral Program will be converted to shares of Apache common stock and paid out upon the non-employee directors retirement or other termination of his or her  directorship.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Review of Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In our annual review of director compensation, the benchmarking analysis provided to the Board for 2016 indicated that the average director compensation was just above the 25th  percentile of our Compensation Peer Group (as defined in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section) at that time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Share Ownership Requirement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a minimum share ownership requirement for non-employee directors that requires each non-employee director to directly own shares and/or share equivalents the  total value of which is equal to or greater than six times the annual Board retainer paid in cash, excluding additional retainers for service as a committee chair or as non-executive  chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on an annual Board cash retainer of $100,000, each non-employee director is required to own shares and/or share equivalents the total value of which is at least  $600,000 based on the value as of the acquisition date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors must meet the ownership requirement within three years of the later of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) July 16, 2014, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the date of his or her appointment to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once achieved, each non-employee director must continue to meet the minimum share ownership requirement for the duration of his or her service on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 28,  2017, each non-employee director, other than Ms. Bay, Mr. Rabun, and Mr. Ragauss, directly owned shares of the Companys common stock and/or share equivalents with total value  equal to or greater than $600,000 (six times the annual cash board retainer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Bay has until July 16, 2017, to meet the requirement; Mr. Ragauss has until December 16, 2017, to  meet the requirement; and Mr. Rabun has until May 13, 2018, to meet the requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See beneficial ownership information under the heading Securities Ownership and Principal  Holders below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pledging and Hedging Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a pledging policy that prohibits non-employee directors and executive officers from holding Apache securities in a margin account or pledging any Apache  securities as collateral for a loan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company also has a hedging policy that prohibits non-employee directors and executive officers from entering into any hedge, or other  transaction (such as puts, calls, options, or other derivative securities) in Apache securities that has the effect of limiting the risk of ownership of Apache common stock or stock  options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the date of this proxy statement, each non-employee director was in compliance with the Companys pledging and hedging policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outside Directors Retirement Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An unfunded retirement plan for non-employee directors was established in December 1992.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Outside Directors Retirement Plan was most recently amended on July 16, 2014,  effective as of June 30, 2014, to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) limit participation to those members first elected to the Board of Directors on or before June 30, 2014, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) specify that the amount of benefits  will be determined as of the earlier of the date the non-employee director ceases to be a member of the Board of Directors or June 30, 2014, at which date the annual cash Board  retainer was $150,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The plan is administered by the MD&C Committee and generally pays an annual benefit equal to 100 percent of the retired directors annual cash Board retainer for a period based  on length of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payments are made either
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) on a quarterly basis, for a maximum of ten years, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) in a single lump sum equal to the net present value of the quarterly  payments to which the director is entitled, and are paid from the general assets of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of the directors death prior to receipt of all benefits payable under the  plan, the remaining benefits are payable to the directors surviving spouse or designated beneficiary until the earlier of the termination of the payment period or the death of the  surviving spouse or designated beneficiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, benefits were paid under this plan to four former directors who retired from the Companys Board of Directors in 2013, 2014,  or 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior Plan for Directors Equity Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Equity Compensation Plan for Non-Employee Directors, originally established in February 1994, was terminated in January 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The original expiration date for this plan was  July 1,2009, with a maximum of 50,000 shares of common stock (115,500 shares after adjustment for the Companys 2002 and 2003 stock dividends and 2004 stock split) for awards  granted during the term of the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, in February 2007, the plan was amended to provide that no new awards would be granted subsequent to January 1, 2007, and no  awards have been made since that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The plan continues in existence solely for the purpose of governing still-outstanding awards made prior to January 1,2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards were made from shares of common stock held in the Companys treasury and were automatic and non-discretionary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares awarded under the plan have vested, have ful dividend and voting rights, and are not eligible for sale while the non-employee director is still serving as a member of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Outreach
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our 2016 Annual Meeting, our say-on-pay proposal received support from 96 percent of our shareholders who voted on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Though the Board is encouraged that a vast  majority of our shareholders supported our compensation program design, it sought to understand and address any significant areas of shareholder concern.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we engaged with the majority of our shareholders in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the course of the year, our engagement team conducted 61 in-person meetings with our shareholders,  including in-person meetings with 15 of our top 25 shareholders representing 54 percent of Apaches shares outstanding in aggregate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some of the engagements included our  independent directors, as gathering and incorporating shareholder feedback is a Board priority.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A key objective of these engagement sessions was to solicit shareholder feedback on  strengthening our compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subsequently, that feedback was relayed directly to the Board, which considered it while evaluating opportunities to further enhance our  executive compensation program for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What We Heard________________________________________________________________ Change Implemented_________________________________________________ Shareholders expressed concern with the inclusion of management objectives in the  We removed the management objectives from the  annual bonus plan calculation calculation of our annual incentive plan due to added complexity and lack of  for 2016.

sentences.text: transparency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Several shareholders expressed concern with the rigor of the Health, Safety, Security,  We set Apaches 2016 health and safety goals based on  the top quartile, three- and Environmental operational goal component of the annual cash incentive bonus, as it  year average performance of industry peers, was set to internal benchmarking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We firmly believe that the changes that have been made to our compensation program are responsive to shareholder concerns and that our compensation program effectively aligns  executive compensation with the key drivers of long-term growth and economic value creation for our shareholders.

sentences.text: 2016 Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continued an effort begun in 2013 to comprehensively review and modify Apaches executive compensation programs to ensure that they support our  pay-for-performance philosophy, align executives interests with those of our shareholders, and attract, motivate, and retain exceptional executive talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the  following changes were made to our executive compensation programs for 2016:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: changes were made to our executive compensation programs for 2016: Discontinued the use of management objectives from the 2016 annual bonus calculation to remove complexities in the annual cash incentive bonus and incorporate feedback from our shareholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Decreased annual target bonuses for the majority of executives to more closely align with the market effective January 1,2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted the executive equity mix to include a portfolio of equity vehicles: performance shares, restricted stock units, and stock options; Modified the portion of performance-based equity awards granted to the CEO; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We froze NEO salaries in 2016 as part of Apaches continued effort to reduce capital, overhead, and operating costs to live within our means; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee accepted managements recommendation of a 172 percent annual cash incentive bonus pool, which was between the 142 percent to 182 percent  range actually achieved, due to outstanding achievement of the Companys goals for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay Best Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation best practices include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Significant Performance-Based Pay: 52 percent and 48 percent of the ongoing pay mix for our CEO and current NEOs is variable and performance-based respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In aggregate, 50 percent of the target compensation for our CEO and other NEOs for 2016 is variable and performance-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term vesting: Our equity-based pay vehicles have multi-year vesting periods to reward long-term performance and deter inappropriate risk takin
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Multiple Performance Measures: We use multiple metrics to evaluate Company performance, covering both short-term and long-t
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Requirements: We have stock ownership requirements for our directors and officers; our CEO must hold six-times base salary in stock; all officers  and directors have hold-until-retirement or termination requirements in addition to their multiple-of-pay holding requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All our NEOs comply with, and own shares  sufficient to meet, these ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Repricing: Our stock options cannot be repriced, reset, or exchanged for cash if under water without shareholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-Pledging and Hedging Policies: We prohibit our directors and executive officers from
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) holding Apache securities in a margin account or pledging any Apache  securities as collateral for a loan, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) entering into any hedge or other transaction in Apache securities that limits the risk of ownership of Apache common stock or  stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Double Trigger Change in Control Provisions: We have a formal policy of requiring a double trigger to receive cash severance and to receive accelerated vesting of  equity awards upon a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000006769/000119312517098765/d327050ddefl4a.htm

sentences.text: Clawback: Each equity award is conditioned on repayment or forfeiture as required by existing law, including the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 and Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, under our Executive Compensation Clawback Policy, each executive officers incentive award is subject to repayment or such other means of recovery (or a combination thereof) as the Board determines appropriate in the event of a material negative restatement as the result of fraud, intentional misconduct, or gross negligence by such executive officer.

sentences.text: 2016 Business Highlights -  Strategic Transformation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, Apache continued to successfully navigate a challenging commodity price environment in the oil and gas industry by improving capital efficiency and delivering cost  reductions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also progressed Apaches strategic transformation from growth through acquisition and exploitation to our current focus on organic growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apaches strategy for value  creation comprises:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strategic objective to live within cash flow
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We demonstrated our strategic focus on organic growth and strong technical capabilities with our significant Alpine High discovery in the Delaware Basin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After more than two years of  extensive geologic and geophysical work, methodical acreage accumulation, and strategic testing and delineation drilling, Apache confirmed the discovery in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apaches Alpine  High acreage totals approximately 320,000 net acres at year-end 2016 in the southern portion of the Delaware Basin, primarily in Reeves County, Texas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apache estimates significant  hydrocarbons in place on its acreage position, which includes numerous identified future drilling locations in the Barnett and Woodford formations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also believe there is significant  potential in the shallower Pennsylvanian, Bone Springs, and Wolfcamp formations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our deliberate focus on strategic testing during the downturn in the oil and gas industry also significantly improved results in Apaches other Permian Basin plays.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apaches economic  drilling inventory in the Permian Basin is more extensive than at any other time in its history and should continue to grow as we further delineate our vast acreage position in the  basin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation structure for our chief executive officer and president is specifically designed so that a large portion of his compensation directly aligns his interests with those of  our shareholders.

sentences.text: Annual Cash Incentive Bonus
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual cash incentive plan is designed to motivate and reward executives for achieving key business objectives that continue to drive Apaches success and generate returns for  our shareholders.

sentences.text: How our Targets are Established
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Targets are set at the beginning of the year based on our Plan,  or expectations for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use a bottom-up approach to develop our Plan, based on cost estimates submitted  rom each region and department.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because we operate in a commodity price-driven business, our Plan year-over-year is adjusted to adapt to our strategy in the given environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our strategy for 2016 was to maintain cash flow neutrality, drive our cost structure down, and focus on returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To execute on this strategy, our targets were set aggressively as  ollows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Production, reserve replacement, and rate of return on drilling program targets were set at or above Plan to align with our capital budget and focus on projects that were  economic in the depressed price environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lease Operating Expense (LOE) and General and Administrative (G&A) per Barrels of Oil Equivalent (BOE) targets were established at Plan for 2016, based on adjusted  production.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This was a change from 2015, where GAAP production was used.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because of this, the targets for 2016 appear higher relative to 2015 when actual absolute  cost targets in 2016 were set significantly lower.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We raised the bar on our Health, Safety, Security, and Environmental measures by establishing each target at the top quartile of our industry peers.

sentences.text: Executive compensation decision making is a core Board responsibility.

sentences.text: The independent members of the Board review, modify as needed, and approve the MD&C Committee recommendations for the CEOs total compensation.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review our goals and objectives, evaluate performance in light of such goals, and recommend the CEOs compensation to the Board for approval by the independen directors.

sentences.text: Make recommendations to the Board concerning the base salary, incentive, and equity-based compensation plans for executive officers other than the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and recommend to the Board broad-based, long-term compensation programs for executive and non-executive employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ensure compensation does not incentivize excessive risk.

sentences.text: Role of the Compensation Consultant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has authorized the MD&C Committee to retain an independent compensation consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee engaged the Consultant on November 10, 2016, replacing  Meridian Compensation Partners, to provide independent compensation advice and data.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Consultant annually assesses our compensation programs potential for risk and its  competitiveness relative to our peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Consultant received de minimis compensation for limited advisory services provided with respect to broad-based compensation in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each year the MD&C Committee reviews the independence of the Consultant and obtains written certification that the Consultant complies with its own independence rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  MD&C Committee determined that each of the Consultant and Meridian Compensation Partners was independent during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of Management
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the use of the Consultant, the MD&C Committee receives compensation recommendations and evaluations of the executive group from the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C  Committee, along with each of the independent directors, is authorized by the Board to obtain information from, and work directly with, any employee in fulfilling its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our senior vice president of human resources prepares materials for the CEO and the MD&C Committee for the exercise of their distinct, but interrelated, compensation  responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee also utilizes the data provided by the Consultant, including recommendations for the associated compensation values derived from their  reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee carefully considers the recommendations of the CEO, management, and the Consultant to reach final determinations in order to recommend actions to  the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk  Considerations  i n   Our  Compensation  Programs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee does not believe our compensation programs encourage inappropriate risk taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee, with assistance from the Consultant, arrived at this  conclusion for the following reasons:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our employees receive both fixed and variable compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The fixed portion provides a steady income regardless of the Companys stock performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This allows  executives to focus on the Companys business without an excessive focus on the Companys stock price performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The goals and objectives for the annual cash incentive bonus are set to avoid overweighting any single factor that, if not achieved, would result in the loss of a large percentage of compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our equity awards for executives generally vest over three to five-year periods, which discourages short-term risk taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our substantial equity holding requirements extend these time frames further.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000006769/000119312517098765/d327050ddefl4a.htm

sentences.text: Our equity ownership requirements encourage a long-term perspective by our executives.

sentences.text: Tax  Legislation Related  t o   Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, imposes a limit, with certain exceptions, on the amount that a publicly held corporation may deduct in any tax  year commencing on or after January 1, 1994, for the compensation paid or accrued to its chief executive officer and three highest compensated officers (other than the principal  executive officer or the principal financial officer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MD&C Committee periodically reviews our compensation plans based upon these regulations to determine what further actions  or changes, if any, would be appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2005 Stock Option Plan, 2007 Omnibus Equity Compensation Plan, 2011 Omnibus Equity Compensation Plan, and 2016 Omnibus Compensation Plan were approved by our  shareholders and grants made under such plans qualify as performance-based under the regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our existing annual cash incentive compensation plan and special  achievement bonuses do not meet the requirements of the regulations, as the shareholder approvals necessary for exemption were not sought.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, these plans operate  similarly to prior or other existing plans and are designed to reward the contribution and performance of employees and to provide a meaningful incentive for achieving Apaches  goals, which in turn enhances shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No further grants can be made under the 2005 Stock Option Plan, 2007 Omnibus Equity Compensation Plan, or 2011 Omnibus  Equity Compensation Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the MD&C Committee cannot predict how our compensation policies may be further affected by this limitation, it is anticipated that executive  compensation paid or accrued pursuant to our compensation plans that have not met the requirements of the regulations will not result in any material loss of tax deductions in the  foreseeable future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internal Revenue Code section 409A requires nonqualified deferred compensation plans to meet requirements in order to avoid acceleration of the recipients federal income  taxation of the deferred compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Internal Revenue Service issued final regulations in April 2007 regarding the application of Section 409A, which were generally effective  January 1, 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to effectiveness, companies were expected to comply in good faith with the statute, taking note of the interim guidance issued by the Internal Revenue  Service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We amended several of our benefit plans in order for them to be exempt from Section 409A, while we continue to provide benefits through several plans that remain subject  to Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The terms of these plans were amended before January 1,2009, as necessary, and are intended to meet the requirements of the final regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
